nodes.text: A drag course used for Podracing existed on the Outer rim planet of Tatooine. The course was simple, weaving out of an arena and into a series of turns in the desert, with few hazards minus some sharper turns near the final stretch of the race. The Veknoid pilot Teemto Pagalies was favored here, and would challenge other racers to one-on-one matches.
The course first appeared, unnamed, in the 1999 Gameboy Color video game Star Wars Episode I: Racer. It's one of five courses available at the start of the game.
